title: Flipped Learning-Based Business Foreign Language Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and job-related foundational vocabulary
context.additional_context: Customized language education for corporate managers/leaders, optimized for task-oriented work simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize intermediate-level foreign language expressions with 80% accuracy in job-specific scenarios (meetings, presentations, negotiations) within VR simulation environments.
Learners apply prior knowledge acquired through flipped learning with over 90% participation in team-based role-playing activities.
Learners achieve scores of 70+ in three consecutive weekly summative assessments for real-world document writing (emails, reports).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
